Title: Requires signage warning about EBT/SNAP skimming and mandates chip-enabled point-of-sale systems for SNAP transactions
Summary: Requires signage warning about EBT/SNAP skimming at all retail food stores; mandates chip-enabled point-of-sale systems for SNAP transactions.
LawCode: Amd ยง95, Soc Serv L; add ยง397-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the general business law, in relation to requiring signage warning about EBT/SNAP skimming and mandating chip-enabled point-of-sale systems for SNAP transactions
